title: WTB - Jake Pfeister - Throwing cards - Any Backs
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB - Jake Pfeister - Throwing cards - Any Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for Jake Pfeister - Throwing cards, will take any backs, prefer to find cards in at least VG or better condition, raw or graded.

For tougher backs like AB, cycle, EPDG, etc. I will consider lower condition.

You can email me with what you have available [url]Stevea@tractorpartsasap.com[/url]

Thanks,
Steve
Picked up a Cycle 460 & AB350nf, still looking for a few more if anyone has any.
